description: Gets the balance of a specific token, including native tokens, for a given address (wallet or contract) on the blockchain.

parameters.name: tokenIdentifier
parameters.description: The container for the identifier for the token, including the unique token ID and its blockchain network. The blockchain network of the token. contractAddress (string) --- This is the token's contract address. tokenId (string) --- The unique identifier of the token.

nested_params.name: network
nested_params.description: The blockchain network of the token.

nested_params.name: contractAddress
nested_params.description: This is the token's contract address.

nested_params.name: tokenId
nested_params.description: The unique identifier of the token.

parameters.name: ownerIdentifier
parameters.description: The container for the identifier for the owner. The contract or wallet address for the owner.

nested_params.name: address
nested_params.description: The contract or wallet address for the owner.

parameters.name: atBlockchainInstant
parameters.description: The time for when the TokenBalance is requested or the current time if a time is not provided in the request. time (datetime) --- The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_params.name: time
nested_params.description: The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.

nested_items.name: ownerIdentifier
nested_items.description: The container for the owner identifier.

nested_items.name: address
nested_items.description: The contract or wallet address for the owner.

nested_items.name: tokenIdentifier

nested_items.name: network

nested_items.name: contractAddress
nested_items.description: This is the token's contract address.

nested_items.name: tokenId

nested_items.name: balance
nested_items.description: The container for the token balance.

nested_items.name: time
nested_items.description: The container of the Timestamp of the blockchain instant.
